description: A dream of Veruca's was to one day be a model on Device Bondage. She likes bondage. She like pain. She like to be helpless, so why not, right? Well her time has come and at the hands of Orlando, who has been looking as forward to this meeting as Veruca has. The devices will keep her controlled and make her suffer. The implements will increase her suffering, and at the hands of Orlando, she will never forget the pain she had to endure for the orgasms that she got.
title: Ask, and you shall recieve
